item.title: About us
item.description: The Association of Women in Mathematical Physics (AWMP) has been founded in 2023 with the aim of promoting and supporting women in the field of mathematical physics, establishing a network and meeting space for them, and promote diversity and equal opportunities for all individuals in mathematical physics. The statute of the association can be found here (see here for the English translation). Board Only the name or also the role? Name 1 Name 2… Organizing committee Name 1 Name 2 Name 3 To receive updates about AWMP activities and/or register to the AWMP mailing lists, you may fill the corresponding registration form at the registration page.

item.title: Coffee Meetings
item.description: A regular virtual meeting for informal chatting and networking

item.title: Diversity reading group
item.description: A reading group to discuss research on diversity/inclusion topics

item.title: Events - Women in Math Phys
item.description: A working group promoting events supporting women in mathematical physics.

item.title: Hybrid conferences group
item.description: A working group discussing how to promote conferences which admit online participation, and hence are much more inclusive.

item.title: Mentoring program
item.description: A mentoring program for women in mathematical physics, from student to postdoc level.

item.title: Shaping the initiative
item.description: How to reach out to similar initiatives, include people from all areas of mathematical physics, finding out which initiatives would be appreciated by women in our community, investigate funding possibilities.

item.title: Website
item.description: A group working on the dissemination of AWMP activities and projects via a website.
